translated: “Upāli,

original: yod de mtshams gcad par bya ba chos gos dang mi 'bral ba'i sdom pa ma byin na'o //
analyzed: yod de mtshams gcad par bya ba chos gos dang mi 'bral ba'i sdom pa ma byin na'o //
translated: if the boundaries have not been established, he can be separated from his robes if he does not have the vow not to be separated from his robes.”

original: btsun pa / re zhig mtshams ma bcad pa'i gnas su gang tshun chad dge slong chos gos dang bral ba zhes bgyi /
analyzed: btsun pa / re zhig mtshams ma bcad pa'i gnas su gang tshun chad dge slong chos gos dang bral ba zhes bgyi /
translated: “Reverend, in a place where the boundaries have not been established, from what point is a monk said to be separated from his robes?”

original: nye bar 'khor /
analyzed: nye bar 'khor /
translated: “Upāli,

original: ji tsam gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor chab khung sa'am /
analyzed: ji tsam gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor chab khung sa'am /
translated: as far as the vicinity of the temple, the well,

original: sgo khyams sam /🔽khang phran nam /
analyzed: sgo khyams sam / khang phran nam /
translated: the portico,🔽the small room,

original: kun dga' ra ba'am /
analyzed: kun dga' ra ba'am /
translated: the garden,

original: dge slong gis kun tu spyad pa'am /🔽ra ba'am / 'greng rib bam /
analyzed: dge slong gis kun tu spyad pa'am / ra ba'am / 'greng rib bam /
translated: the monk’s quarters,

original: 'obs yod pa'o //
analyzed: 'obs yod pa'o //
translated: the wall, the fence, or the moat.”

original: btsun pa / dge slong yang gnas gcig la steng g-yogs kyang gcig pa zhig na mchis la /
analyzed: btsun pa / dge slong yang gnas gcig la steng g-yogs kyang gcig pa zhig na mchis la /
translated: “Reverend, if a monk is in a single building with a single roof,

original: de nyid na chos gos kyang mchis na chos gos de dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam /
analyzed: de nyid na chos gos kyang mchis na chos gos de dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam /
translated: “Lord, if he has his Dharma robes there, would he be separated from his Dharma robes?”

original: nye bar 'khor /
analyzed: nye bar 'khor /
translated: “Upāli,

original: yod de / 'di ltar gnas de mu stegs can sna tshogs dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / spyod pa dang / kun tu rgyu rnams sam /
analyzed: yod de / 'di ltar gnas de mu stegs can sna tshogs dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / spyod pa dang / kun tu rgyu rnams sam /
translated: it is possible that the place where he stays belongs to various tīrthikas, ascetics, brahmins, practitioners, or wandering mendicants,

original: spun nor bgos pa rnams kyi yin na'o //
analyzed: spun nor bgos pa rnams kyi yin na'o //
translated: or to brothers who have divided the inheritance.”

original: btsun pa / re zhig dge slong gis mtshams kyi slad rol la mtshams kyi slad rol tu 'du shes pas; skya rengs 'char bar bgyid na cir 'gyur lags /
analyzed: btsun pa / re zhig dge slong gis mtshams kyi slad rol la mtshams kyi slad rol tu 'du shes pas; skya rengs 'char bar bgyid na cir 'gyur lags /
translated: “Lord, if a monk makes the first flush of dawn appear outside the monastery zone, thinking it is outside the monastery zone, what is his offense?”

original: spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
translated: “It’s an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.”

original: mtshams kyi nang la mtshams kyi slad rol du 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags /
analyzed: mtshams kyi nang la mtshams kyi slad rol du 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags /
translated: “If it is inside the monastery zone, but he perceives it as outside, what is his offense?”

original: nyes byas so //
analyzed: nyes byas so //
translated: “It’s an offense of wrong conduct.”

original: mtshams kyi slad @47b rol na mtshams kyi nang du 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags /
analyzed: mtshams kyi slad @47b rol na mtshams kyi nang du 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags /
translated: “If it is outside the monastery zone, but he perceives it as inside, what is his offense?”

original: ltung ba med do //
analyzed: ltung ba med do //
translated: “There is no offense.”

original: mtshams kyi nang la mtshams kyi nang du 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags /
analyzed: mtshams kyi nang la mtshams kyi nang du 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags /
translated: “If it is inside the monastery zone, and he perceives it as inside, what is his offense?”

original: ltung ba med do //
analyzed: ltung ba med do //
translated: There is no offense.

original: btsun pa / re zhig dge slong gis mtshams kyi nang du chos gos bzhag ste mtshams kyi slad rol tu skya rengs 'char bar bgyid pa las /
analyzed: btsun pa / re zhig dge slong gis mtshams kyi nang du chos gos bzhag ste mtshams kyi slad rol tu skya rengs 'char bar bgyid pa las /
translated: “Reverend, what if a monk leaves his robes inside the boundaries, but the dawn breaks while he is outside the boundaries,

original: mtshan gyur te dge slong mar red na cir 'gyur lags /
analyzed: mtshan gyur te dge slong mar red na cir 'gyur lags /
translated: and he changes sex, becoming a nun?

original: spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
translated: “He would commit an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.

original: btsun pa / re zhig dge slong ma zhig gis mtshams kyi nang du chos gos bzhag la mtshams kyi slad rol tu skya rengs 'char bar bgyid pa las /
analyzed: btsun pa / re zhig dge slong ma zhig gis mtshams kyi nang du chos gos bzhag la mtshams kyi slad rol tu skya rengs 'char bar bgyid pa las /
translated: “Reverend, what if a nun leaves her robes inside the boundaries, but the dawn breaks while she is outside the boundaries,

original: mtshan gyur te dge slong du red na cir 'gyur lags /
analyzed: mtshan gyur te dge slong du red na cir 'gyur lags /
translated: and she changes sex, becoming a monk?

original: spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
translated: “She would commit an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.

original: btsun pa dge slong gis gang gi mdun du chos gos byin gyis brlab par bgyid /
analyzed: btsun pa dge slong gis gang gi mdun du chos gos byin gyis brlab par bgyid /
translated: “Reverend, in front of whom should a monk purify his robe?

original: nye bar 'khor /
analyzed: nye bar 'khor /
translated: “Upāli,

original: dge slong gis ni dge slong gi mdun du chos gos byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong gis ni dge slong gi mdun du chos gos byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
translated: a monk should purify his robe in front of a monk.

original: btsun pa / dge slong mas gang gi mdun du chos gos byin gyis brlab par bgyi /
analyzed: btsun pa / dge slong mas gang gi mdun du chos gos byin gyis brlab par bgyi /
translated: “Lord, in front of whom should a nun consecrate her robes?”

original: nye bar 'khor /
analyzed: nye bar 'khor /
translated: “Upāli,

original: dge slong mas ni dge slong ma'i mdun du chos gos byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
analyzed: dge slong mas ni dge slong ma'i mdun du chos gos byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
translated: a nun should consecrate her robes in front of a nun.

original: dbyung ba dang / rung bar bya ba yang de bzhin du bya'o //
analyzed: dbyung ba dang / rung bar bya ba yang de bzhin du bya'o //
translated: The same applies to the lifting of restrictions and the purification ceremony.

original: btsun pa / re zhig bslab pa stsal pa chos gos ma mchis par mtshams kyi slad rol tu skya rengs 'char bar bgyid na cir 'gyur lags /
analyzed: btsun pa / re zhig bslab pa stsal pa chos gos ma mchis par mtshams kyi slad rol tu skya rengs 'char bar bgyid na cir 'gyur lags /
translated: “Lord, if someone who has been given the precepts goes outside the monastery zone without his robes, what is he to do?”

original: spang ba'i ltung byed du gyur te /
analyzed: spang ba'i ltung byed du gyur te /
translated: “He becomes guilty of a pāyattika offense.

original: de bzhin du dge slong ma la ni chos gos lngas spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du dge slong ma la ni chos gos lngas spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, a nun becomes guilty of a pāyattika offense if she goes outside the monastery zone without her five robes.

original: dge slob ma dang / dge tshul dang / dge tshul ma rnams la ni nyes pa med do //
analyzed: dge slob ma dang / dge tshul dang / dge tshul ma rnams la ni nyes pa med do //

original: sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la @48a *//
analyzed: sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la @48a *//
translated: If someone has previously committed an offense,

original: ni; nyes byas te /
analyzed: ni; nyes byas te /
translated: he becomes guilty of an offense of wrong conduct.

original: snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The rest is the same as before.

original: sdom la / sems 'khrugs pa dang dus las 'das /
analyzed: sdom la / sems 'khrugs pa dang dus las 'das /
translated: The summary: Disturbed mind, beyond the time,

original: de bzhin rung ba nyid dang ni /
analyzed: de bzhin rung ba nyid dang ni /

original: mi rung pa dang gding ba dang // tshad dang bzhi tshan dag dang mtshan //
analyzed: mi rung pa dang gding ba dang // tshad dang bzhi tshan dag dang mtshan //

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa /
translated: The venerable Upāli asked the Blessed Buddha,

original: btsun pa / bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong chos gos zin pas chos gos sra brkyang phyung nas dus ma yin pa'i gos rnyed pa 'dod na /
analyzed: btsun pa / bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong chos gos zin pas chos gos sra brkyang phyung nas dus ma yin pa'i gos rnyed pa 'dod na /
translated: “Reverend, the Blessed One has said, ‘If a monk whose robes are finished obtains robe-cloth at an improper time,

original: dge slong des chos gos de blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong des chos gos de blang bar bya'o //
translated: and if he desires it, that monk should accept it.

original: blangs nas gal te longs na /
analyzed: blangs nas gal te longs na /
translated: If he accepts it, but it is not enough,

original: myur ba kho nar chos gos su byas te bcad par bya'o //
analyzed: myur ba kho nar chos gos su byas te bcad par bya'o //

original: gal te mi longs la kha ma longs pa skong pa'i gos la re ba yod na yang /
analyzed: gal te mi longs la kha ma longs pa skong pa'i gos la re ba yod na yang /

original: dge slong des chos gos de zla ba gcig gi bar du gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong des chos gos de zla ba gcig gi bar du gzhag par bya'o //

original: de la 'das par 'jog na /
analyzed: de la 'das par 'jog na /
translated: If he keeps it longer than that,

original: spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
translated: he commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.’”

original: zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa /
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa /

original: btsun pa / re zhig dge slong gis chos gos shig rnyed ma thag tu sems 'khrugs par gyur na /
analyzed: btsun pa / re zhig dge slong gis chos gos shig rnyed ma thag tu sems 'khrugs par gyur na /

original: gang nas bzung ste de'i zla ba bgrang bar bgyi /
analyzed: gang nas bzung ste de'i zla ba bgrang bar bgyi /

original: gang nas bzung ste rang gi sems phyir rnyed pa nas so //
analyzed: gang nas bzung ste rang gi sems phyir rnyed pa nas so //

original: btsun pa / bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis zla ba gcig gi bar du chos gos gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: btsun pa / bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis zla ba gcig gi bar du chos gos gzhag par bya'o //
translated: “Lord, the Blessed One said, ‘A monk should keep a Dharma robe for one month.’

original: zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa /
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa /

analyzed: btsun pa / dge slong gis nam 'tsho'i bar du chos gos bzhag kyang ltung bar mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam /

original: nye bar 'khor /
analyzed: nye bar 'khor /
translated: “Upāli,

original: yod de / zla ba gcig tshun @48b chad du dus byas na'o //
analyzed: yod de / zla ba gcig tshun @48b chad du dus byas na'o //

analyzed: btsun pa / bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis chos gos zla ba gcig gi bar du gzhag par bya'o // zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa /
translated: “Lord, the Blessed One said, ‘A monk should keep a Dharma robe for one month.’

original: chos gos de ji lta bu zhig lags /
analyzed: chos gos de ji lta bu zhig lags /
translated: What is that Dharma robe?

original: bdun po dag las brtags pa gang yang rung pa ngas rjes su gnang zhing ma bkag pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: bdun po dag las brtags pa gang yang rung pa ngas rjes su gnang zhing ma bkag pa gang yin pa'o //

original: btsun pa / bcom ldan 'das kyis /
analyzed: btsun pa / bcom ldan 'das kyis /
translated: “Reverend, the Blessed One said,

original: dge slong gis chos gos zla ba gcig gi bar du gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong gis chos gos zla ba gcig gi bar du gzhag par bya'o //

analyzed: zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa /
translated: What does this mean?🔽“Reverend, is it the case that if a monk keeps his robe for more than one month, he does not commit an offense entailing relinquishment?”🔽“Upāli,🔽it is the case that if a monk keeps his robe for more than one month, he does not commit an offense entailing relinquishment.

analyzed: yod de / de 'di ltar chos gos kyi spun rung bar gyur ba rgyu mi rung bar gyur pa dang / spun mi rung bar gyur la rgyu rung bar gyur pa dang / gnyi ga mi rung bar gyur pa ste; mi rung ba ni /

analyzed: zla ba gcig las lhag par bzhag kyang nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
translated: If he keeps it for more than a month, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.”

analyzed: btsun pa / bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis chos gos de zla ba gcig gi bar du gzhag par bya'o //

original: zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa /
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa /
translated: What is this that you have said?🔽

original: btsun pa; dge slong gis dgung zla drug tu chos gos bzhag kyang ltung bar mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam /
analyzed: btsun pa; dge slong gis dgung zla drug tu chos gos bzhag kyang ltung bar mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam /
translated: “Lord, is it the case that a monk can keep a robe for six months without committing an offense?”

original: nye bar 'khor /
analyzed: nye bar 'khor /
translated: “Upāli,

original: yod de / chos gos de rnyed nas zhag sum cu lon pa dang / dge @49a *//
analyzed: yod de / chos gos de rnyed nas zhag sum cu lon pa dang / dge @49a *//
translated: it is the case that if a monk has obtained a robe, and thirty days have passed,

original: 'dun gyi sra brkyang bting bar gyur na'o //
analyzed: 'dun gyi sra brkyang bting bar gyur na'o //
translated: and the saṅgha has opened the robe-making season,

original: btsun pa / bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos gsum du ma tshang na zla ba gcig gi bar du gzhag go /
analyzed: btsun pa / bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos gsum du ma tshang na zla ba gcig gi bar du gzhag go /
translated: “Lord, the Blessed One said, ‘If a monk is missing one of his three robes, he may keep it for one month.’

original: zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa /
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa /
translated: What is this that you have said?🔽

original: btsun pa / dge slong gang chos gos gsum tshang par gyur pa des chos gos mi longs pa zhig rnyed na des kyang dgung zla gcig gi bar du gzhag par bgyi lags sam /
analyzed: btsun pa / dge slong gang chos gos gsum tshang par gyur pa des chos gos mi longs pa zhig rnyed na des kyang dgung zla gcig gi bar du gzhag par bgyi lags sam /
translated: “Lord, if a monk who has a complete set of three robes obtains a robe that he needs, may he also keep it for one month?”

original: nye bar 'khor /
analyzed: nye bar 'khor /
translated: Upāli,

original: ma yin no //
analyzed: ma yin no //
translated: No, they do not.🔽

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: nye bar 'khor /
analyzed: nye bar 'khor /
translated: Upāli,

original: chos gos gsum tshang na chos gos gzhan rnyed pa gang yin pa ni longs kyang rung /
analyzed: chos gos gsum tshang na chos gos gzhan rnyed pa gang yin pa ni longs kyang rung /
translated: if one has a complete set of three robes and obtains another robe,

original: mi longs kyang rung ste /
analyzed: mi longs kyang rung ste /
translated: whether one uses it or not,

original: de thams cad ni zhag bcu pa yin no //
analyzed: de thams cad ni zhag bcu pa yin no //
translated: it is to be relinquished within ten days.

original: chos gos gsum du ma tshang ba las gal te chos gos su longs pa zhig rnyed na de yang zhag bcu pa yin no //
analyzed: chos gos gsum du ma tshang ba las gal te chos gos su longs pa zhig rnyed na de yang zhag bcu pa yin no //
translated: If one who does not have a complete set of three robes obtains a robe that is sufficient for a robe, that also is to be relinquished within ten days.

original: 'on te ma longs pa zhig rnyed na zla ba gcig gi bar du gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: 'on te ma longs pa zhig rnyed na zla ba gcig gi bar du gzhag par bya'o //
translated: But if one obtains a robe that is not sufficient for a robe, one may keep it for one month.

original: de las 'das par bzhag na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las 'das par bzhag na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
translated: If one keeps it longer than that, one commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.

original: btsun pa / re zhig dge slong gis dgung zla gcig la gcig tu 'du shes pas skya rengs 'char par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags /
analyzed: btsun pa / re zhig dge slong gis dgung zla gcig la gcig tu 'du shes pas skya rengs 'char par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags /
translated: “If a monk, thinking that a month has passed, makes the dawn break, what does he commit?”

original: spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
translated: “He commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.”

original: dgung zla gcig la dgung zla gcig ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags /
analyzed: dgung zla gcig la dgung zla gcig ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags /
translated: “If a month has not passed, but he perceives it as having passed, what does he commit?”

original: ltung ba med do //
analyzed: ltung ba med do //
translated: “He commits no offense.”

original: dgung zla gcig ma lags pa la dgung zla gcig tu 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags /
analyzed: dgung zla gcig ma lags pa la dgung zla gcig tu 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags /
translated: What if it is not a month, but one perceives it as a month?

original: nyes byas so //
analyzed: nyes byas so //
translated: It is a wrong action.

original: dgung zla gcig ma lags pa la dgung zla gcig ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags /
analyzed: dgung zla gcig ma lags pa la dgung zla gcig ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags /

original: cir 'gyur lags /
analyzed: cir 'gyur lags /

original: nyes byas so //
analyzed: nyes byas so //

analyzed: thob na / cir 'gyur lags /
translated: what is the offense?”

original: nyes byas kho na'o //
analyzed: nyes byas kho na'o //
translated: “It is just an offense of wrong conduct.”

analyzed: btsun pa / re zhig dge slong dge slong gi slad dang / dge slong ma dang / dge slob ma dang / dge tshul dang / dge tshul ma'i slad du rnam par rtog pa rig nas chos gos slong na /

original: cir 'gyur lags /
analyzed: cir 'gyur lags /
translated: what is the offense?”

original: nyes byas so //
analyzed: nyes byas so //
translated: “You have committed an offense of wrong conduct.”

original: chos gos thob na /
analyzed: chos gos thob na /
translated: “If he obtains a Dharma robe,

original: cir 'gyur lags /
analyzed: cir 'gyur lags /
translated: what is the offense?”

original: nyes byas kho na'o //
analyzed: nyes byas kho na'o //
translated: “It is just an offense of wrong conduct.”

original: ji ltar dge slong gis rnam par rtog pa rig nas bslangs pa la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba de bzhin du bslab pa byin pa dang / dge slong ma la yang spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro //🔽dge slob ma dang / dge tshul dang / dge tshul ma dang / sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni /
analyzed: ji ltar dge slong gis rnam par rtog pa rig nas bslangs pa la spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba de bzhin du bslab pa byin pa dang / dge slong ma la yang spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro // dge slob ma dang / dge tshul dang / dge tshul ma dang / sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni /
translated: Just as it is a downfall for a monk to ask for something after he has understood that it is a fantasy, in the same way, it is a downfall for a nun to ask for something after she has understood that it is a fantasy.

original: nyes byas te /
analyzed: nyes byas te /
translated: For a female novice, a male or female layperson, a female candidate for novice vows, a novice, or a female novice, it is a minor infraction.

original: rgyas par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: rgyas par brjod par bya'o //
translated: The rest is as above.

analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa /

translated: “Reverend, the Blessed One has said, ‘If a householder who is not a relative of a monk or a nun

analyzed: bu so so ba nyos la /

analyzed: de na gal te dge slong des sngar ma bstabs par rtog pa 'ga' zhig rig ste /

analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa /

translated: Then the messenger should instruct and teach the attendant well and thoroughly, and then go to the monk.

analyzed: de la 'di skad ces /

analyzed: de'i gan du bzhud cig dang / des khyed la chos gos rung ba dus su bskon par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: bdag chos gos 'dod do //

original: tshe dang ldan pa zhal ta byed pa /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa zhal ta byed pa /

analyzed: lan gnyis lan gsum du bskul zhing dran par byas na; gal te chos gos de grub na /

original: de lta na legs /
analyzed: de lta na legs /
translated: all is well.

original: gal te ma grub na /
analyzed: gal te ma grub na /
translated: But if it is not finished,

analyzed: de'i 'og tu chos gos bsgrub pa'i phyir brtsal te chos gos grub na /

original: spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro //

original: gal te ma grub na /
analyzed: gal te ma grub na /

analyzed: phyogs gang na chos gos kyi rin 'ongs pa der bdag 'gro bar bya'o //

analyzed: dge slong de'i don cir yang ma grub kyi /

original: shes par gyis shig /
analyzed: shes par gyis shig /

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dag gis rang gi nor chud ma gzan cig / ces spring par bya ste / de la de ni /

original: cho ga yin no //
analyzed: cho ga yin no //
translated: This is the proper conduct.

analyzed: lan lnga / lan drug gi 'og tu slong bar bgyid cing chos gos de grub na /

analyzed: cir 'gyur lags /

analyzed: de bzhin du zhal ta bgyid pa sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor bas nyam thag pa dang / glen pa dang / 'on pa la lan bzhi /

analyzed: lan lnga / lan drug gi 'og tu slong bar bgyid cing chos gos de grub na /
translated: and the robe is finished,

analyzed: cir 'gyur lags /
